*Virtual Tour Available*
A beautifully extended and renovated four-bedroom semi-detached CHARACTER HOME, offering a stunning family lifestyle in a sought-after rural village. Secluded setting, stylish interiors and NO ONWARD CHAIN.

DESCRIPTION
Step inside this beautifully presented home and you are immediately welcomed by a light-filled, open-plan kitchen and breakfast room designed for modern living. With generous storage, a walk-in pantry and a stunning central island, this space truly forms the heart of the home—perfect for everyday family life and entertaining alike. Just off the kitchen is a practical downstairs cloakroom and utility room, adding to the home’s thoughtful layout.
A door leads through to the inviting living room, where a character fireplace with a woodburning stove creates a warm and cosy focal point. There is also a separate dining room, ideal for more formal occasions, while a charming stable door opens directly onto the garden, seamlessly connecting indoor and outdoor living.
Upstairs, the property offers four well-proportioned bedrooms, including a spacious main bedroom with its own en-suite shower room. A sleek, contemporary family bathroom completes the accommodation.

OUTSIDE
To the front of the property, set behind attractive wooden gates, is a generous gravelled parking area providing space for multiple vehicles. A double garage offers secure parking along with useful additional storage in the eaves.
The recently landscaped, private wrap-around garden is a true highlight, featuring a spacious patio area and a fully equipped outdoor kitchen—perfect for entertaining family and friends. A large lawned area provides plenty of space for children to play or for keen gardeners, complemented by a shed for additional storage. An outbuilding, currently used as a home office, adds excellent flexibility and further enhances the appeal of this superb outdoor space.

SERVICES & MATERIAL INFORMATION
All mains services are connected except gas. The property operates on oil central heating.
Council tax band: D
Energy efficiency rating: F

Great Shefford is in the North Wessex Downs’ Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty (AONB) benefitting from a junior school, shop, pub and church, with the River Lambourn flowing through the heart of the village and plenty of countryside walks on the doorstep. Convenient for commuters, it is located only 1 mile from Junction 14 of the M4 and is approximately 9 miles from Newbury and 14 miles from Swindon. Hungerford is just 5 miles away with a comprehensive range of shops, pubs, leisure centre and a mainline railway station with regular trains into London Paddington.

About this agent

Jones Robinson Estate Agents - Lambourn
5 Market Place Lambourn Hungerford, Berkshire RG17 8XU
01488 498548
Full profileProperty listings
Located in the heart of Newbury, David Jones and Charles Robinson joined forces in 1998 and opened our Newbury estate agents branch with just 7 staff and a handful of properties. Since then the company has expanded to almost 90 dedicated members of staff across 6 offices - Didcot, Devizes, Lambourn (near Hungerford), Marlborough and Pewsey, as well as the flagship office at Newbury. Our expert and friendly team are ready to help, whether you're looking to buy, sell, rent or let your property. If you're selling, our sales force have almost 500 years' experience between them, with the aim of achieving the best price for your home and guiding you through every step of the process until we hand over the keys to the new owners. If you're a landlord, our lettings and property management team look after around 1,300 properties, with the aim of achieving the best rental price for your asset and keeping you compliant in the ever-changing world of tenancy and landlord legislation.
